problems.title: Check if Number is Even or Odd
problems.description:
Given a number, check if it is even or odd. Also check if it is positive, negative, or zero.

Print:
- "Even Positive" if number is even and positive
- "Even Negative" if number is even and negative
- "Odd Positive" if number is odd and positive
- "Odd Negative" if number is odd and negative
- "Even Zero" if number is zero

Input Format:
Single integer.

Output Format:
Print the appropriate string based on the conditions.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
10

Sample Output
Even Positive

Sample Input
-5

Sample Output
Odd Negative

Sample Input
0

Sample Output
Even Zero

Explanation:
Use nested conditions to check both parity (even/odd) and sign (positive/negative/zero).
hintsList: First check if number is zero. Then check if positive or negative. Within each, check if even or odd.
